EPUB, MOBI, AZW3, and PDF versions of Ã¢â‚¬Å“Complete Works of Swami VivekandandaÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½,which contains all the books, lecture, discussions, prose, poetry, and letters written by Swami Vivekananda, a spiritual teacher from India at the end of the 19th century who brought Vedanta to the United States and Europe. Vivekananda was a disciple of realized and awakened saint Sri Ramakrishna.

The text and images of this book comes from the website Sri Ramakrishna and Swami Vivekananda, and the book includes a cover, linked table of contents. The formatting has been changed for better reading in book format, meaning paragraph are indented and space is removed between paragraphs, as well as having justification and hyphenation. The single and double quotes have been converted to Ã¢â‚¬Å“smartÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ quotes, while trying to preserve the poor apostrophe. Many scanning artifacts have been removed, but I wouldn't be surprised if many remain.

These ebooks were originally release in 2013 as EPUB and MOBI versions only. I've improved the formats of the table of contents to handle long chapter names better.
